trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGFSTETERNALCEREMONYPLANNER_00217_CLARIBEL_000_000<tab>Greetings, good <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. My name is Claribel, and I have the honor to assist those happy couples who wish to be joined in the sight of gods and men.

TEXT_REGFSTETERNALCEREMONYPLANNER_00217_SYSTEM_000_001<tab>The special quest “The Ties that Bind” is available to those who have completed the quest “The Scions of the Seventh Dawn” and have obtained a promise wristlet.
TEXT_REGFSTETERNALCEREMONYPLANNER_00217_SYSTEM_000_002<tab>There exist three varieties of wristlets, each of which may be acquired via the online store.

TEXT_REGFSTETERNALCEREMONYPLANNER_00217_SYSTEM_000_003<tab>Wristlets are sent to you via the moogle delivery service. By equipping a wristlet, the aforementioned quest will become available from Claribel.
TEXT_REGFSTETERNALCEREMONYPLANNER_00217_SYSTEM_000_004<tab>When accepting this quest, please ensure that you are in a party of two with your partner, who must also be equipped with a wristlet.

TEXT_REGFSTETERNALCEREMONYPLANNER_00217_CLARIBEL_000_020<tab>Good <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((morrow)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var> to you, my <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((lord)) /var>. I trust you have been well.
TEXT_REGFSTETERNALCEREMONYPLANNER_00217_CLARIBEL_000_021<tab>It was an honor and a pleasure both to serve you. If there is aught else I might do for you, please do not hesitate to ask.
TEXT_REGFSTETERNALCEREMONYPLANNER_00217_CLARIBEL_000_030<tab>I am glad to hear that. May the Twelve ever shine Their countenances upon you and your beloved.

TEXT_REGFSTETERNALCEREMONYPLANNER_00217_CLARIBEL_000_040<tab>Another ceremony, my <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((lord)) /var>? I take it to mean that you wish to be joined to another. I shall explain the process that you may undertake to begin anew.

TEXT_REGFSTETERNALCEREMONYPLANNER_00217_SYSTEM_000_041<tab>If you wish to form an eternal bond with a new partner, you must first have your existing bond annulled by relinquishing your eternity ring to the Sanctum acolyte.
TEXT_REGFSTETERNALCEREMONYPLANNER_00217_SYSTEM_000_042<tab>Next, access the online store and acquire a new promise wristlet, which will be sent to you via the moogle delivery service.

TEXT_REGFSTETERNALCEREMONYPLANNER_00217_SYSTEM_000_043<tab>By equipping a wristlet, the special quest “The Ties that Bind” will become available from Claribel. When accepting this quest, please ensure that you are in a party of two with your partner, who must also be equipped with a wristlet.
